attributes.action: Stop rail firms from increasing fare prices
attributes.additional_details: Become a commuter and you’ll understand
attributes.background: Commuters can agree that our rail services are appalling. They are overcrowded, overpriced and overall unpleasant. Increasing rail fares is completely unjust, especially considering the chaos that commuters have experienced recently. Firms cannot maintain their profits at the expense of customers

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/219662

In any case, we could not accept your petition because you have not provided your full name.
